desc: Deprecated: Starts a Real Time Messaging session. Use rtm.connect instead.

token.desc: Authentication token bearing required scopes. Tokens should be passed as an HTTP Authorization header or alternatively, as a POST parameter.

simple_latest.desc: Return timestamp only for latest message object of each channel (improves performance).

no_unreads.desc: Skip unread counts for each channel (improves performance).

mpim_aware.desc: Returns MPIMs to the client in the API response.

presence_sub.desc: Only deliver presence events when requested by subscription. See [presence subscriptions](/apis/web-api/user-presence-and-status#subscriptions).

batch_presence_aware.desc: Batch presence deliveries via subscription. Enabling changes the shape of `presence_change` events. See [batch presence](/apis/web-api/user-presence-and-status#batching).

no_latest.desc: Exclude latest timestamps for channels, groups, mpims, and ims. Automatically sets `no_unreads` to `1`

include_locale.desc: Set this to `true` to receive the locale for users and channels. Defaults to `false`

method_deprecated.desc: `rtm.start` is deprecated. Please use `rtm.connect` instead of `rtm.start`. Read https://docs.slack.dev/changelog/2021-10-rtm-start-to-stop for more info.

migration_in_progress.desc: Workspace is being migrated between servers. See [the `team_migration_started` event documentation](/reference/events/team_migration_started) for details.

rtm_connect_required.desc: `rtm.start` is deprecated. Please use `rtm.connect` instead of `rtm.start`. Read https://docs.slack.dev/changelog/2021-10-rtm-start-to-stop for more info.

member_list_truncated.desc: A `members` array included in a channel object was truncated at 1500 results. Use `conversations.members` to retrieve all results.

method_deprecated.desc: `rtm.start` is deprecated. Please use `rtm.connect` instead of `rtm.start`. Read https://docs.slack.dev/changelog/2021-10-rtm-start-to-stop for more info.
